STOP.format: (prob)% chance to [(mult==0){freeze}(mult!=0){[(mult<0){hasten}(mult>0){slow}] time for hit enemies by (_abs(mult))%}] for (_dispTimeF(time))

time.name: duration
time.tooltip: actual duration is subjected to treasure values and traits. Set duration to negative to override only if proc duration is higher

mult.name: strength
mult.tooltip: Set to 0 for default BC freeze. Set to any number above 0 and below 100 to slow down enemy's timeFlow. Set to negative to speed it up instead

time.name: duration
time.tooltip: actual duration is subjected to treasure values and traits. Set duration to negative to override only if proc duration is higher

CRIT.tooltip: deal more damage to enemies. See mult field for water cannon type attack.
format: (prob)% chance to deal a critical hit
(mult<0){ that deals (_abs(mult))% of metal entity's HP as damage}]

mult.name: multiplier
mult.tooltip: default value is 200. enter negative value for water cannon type attack that deal percent damage to metal enemies.

WAVE.format: (prob)% chance to create a Lv.(lv) [(inverted){inverted}] wave attack[(type.hitless){, even if this attack misses}]

type.hitless.name: Miss Trigger
type.hitless.tooltip: Wave will spawn even if this attack misses

inverted.name: Inverted
inverted.tooltip: Start point, end point, and traversal direction are all inverted

WEAK.format: (prob)% chance to [(mult>100){strengthen}(mult<=100){weaken}] target's attack to (mult)% for (_dispTimeF(time))

mult.name: multiplier
mult.tooltip: What percent of original attack the target will be weaken to

LETHARGY.format: (prob)% chance to [(mult>0){increase}(mult<0){decrease}] target's TBA by [(type.percentage){(_abs(mult))%}(!type.percentage){(_dispTimeD(mult))}] for (_dispTimeF(time))

mult.name: multiplier
mult.tooltip: What amount will the original TBA of the target will be increased to

type.percentage.name: Percentage
type.percentage.tooltip: Simply adds when false, and increases the TBA by percentage when true

time.name: duration
time.tooltip: actual duration is subjected to treasure values and traits. Set duration to negative to override only if proc duration is higher

STRONG.format: Attack increased by (mult)% after health drops below (health)%

LETHAL.format: (prob)% chance to survive a lethal strike

BURROW.format: Burrow [(count<0){infinite times}(count==1){once}(count==2){twice}(count>2){(count) times}] through a distance of (dis)

dis.name: distance
dis.tooltip: burrow time is decided by speed and distance together

REVIVE.tooltip: Basic Revive only includes first 3 parameter. Later parameters are used for Ranged Revive
format: [(type.revive_others){ This ability will be applicable to other
[(type.range_type==0){when this entity is on the stage and walking/waiting/attacking}]
[(type.range_type==1){when this entity is present on the stage}]
[(type.range_type==2){as long as this entity is present on the stage}]

dis_0.name: point 0
dis_0.tooltip: advanced: ranged revive point 0. Applicable only when revive others is enabled

dis_1.name: point 1
dis_1.tooltip: advanced: ranged revive point 1. Applicable only when revive others is enabled

type.range_type.name: range type
tooltip: Applicable only when revive others is enabled
0 for effective in range when in normal state.
1 for effective in range when present on the stage.
2 for effective for allies once passed the range as long as it is on the stage.
3 for effective for allies once passed the range forever

type.revive_non_zombie.name: non-zombie
type.revive_non_zombie.tooltip: revive non-zombie as well. Applicable only when revive others is enabled

type.revive_others.name: revive others
type.revive_others.tooltip: toggle point for advanced range revive feature

block.name: Blocker
block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce distance amongst all units. Set to 100 to completely block KB

block.name: Blocker
block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce duration amongst all units. Set to 100 to completely block freeze

block.name: Blocker
block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce duration amongst all units. Set to 100 to completely block slow

block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce damage. Set to 100 to completely block surges

block.name: Blocker
block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce duration amongst all units. Set to 100 to completely block weaken

smartImu.name: Ignore
smartImu.tooltip: 0 = Resist buffs and debuffs, 1 = Only resistant to attack debuffs, -1 = Only resistant to attack buffs

block.name: Blocker
block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce duration amongst all units. Set to 100 to completely block Lethargy

smartImu.name: Ignore
smartImu.tooltip: 0 = Resist buffs and debuffs, 1 = Only resistant to debuffs, -1 = Only resistant to buffs

block.name: Blocker
block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce duration amongst all units. Set to 100 to completely block warp

block.name: Blocker
block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce duration amongst all units. Set to 100 to completely block seal

format: [(mult<100&mult>0){ (_left)Reduces (mult)% of the summoned entity's strength(_right)}(mult<0){ (_left)Summoned entities will be (_abs(mult))% stronger(_right)}]
[(block<100&block>0){ (_left)Reduces (block)% of the summoned entity's strength(_right)}(block<0){ (_left)Summoned entities will be (_abs(block))% stronger(_right)}]}]

mult.name: percent
mult.tooltip: Only applies to On Hit and On Kill summon.

block.name: Blocker
block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce all summoned entities' strength. Set to 100 to completely block summon

SNIPER.tooltip: This ability penetrates Knock Back Immunity
SNIPER.format: (prob)% chance to deal sniper-styled knock back to target

TIME.tooltip: Unlike Stop, this ability freezes everything including waves, money gain, cat and enemy cool down, etc

intensity.name: intensity
intensity.tooltip: The power of the timestop. If the intensity is lower than the duration, there will be certain intervals where units will be able to move. Set to negative to speed up entities with time stop immunity

SEAL.tooltip: Seal will disable all abilities except Burrow, Metal, Self-Destruct, Only-Attack, and basic Revive

time.name: duration
time.tooltip: actual duration is subjected to treasure values and traits. Set duration to negative to override only if proc duration is higher

format: [(type.same_health){each entity will have the same hp as the summoner, }]
[(type.bond_hp){the summoner's hp will be bound with each summoned entity's hp, }]
[(type.pass_proc!=0){and }]are[(type.ignore_limit){n't}] restricted by the stage entity limit
[(type.pass_proc!=0){, and carry all procs from [(type.pass_proc!=2){the summoner}][(type.pass_proc==3){ and }]}][(type.pass_proc!=1){ each entity hit}].
Summoned entities will be in [(min_layer==max_layer){[(min_layer==-1){the same layer as this entity}(min_layer!=-1){layer (min_layer)}]}
animation[(type.anim_type==3){ and disable burrow for summoned entities}].

dis.name: min distance
dis.tooltip: Minimum distance from this entity by default, or from the target if on hit or on kill is enabled

max_dis.name: max distance
max_dis.tooltip: Max distance from this entity by default, or from the target if on hit or on kill is enabled

mult.name: buff
mult.tooltip: Buff of the summoned entity, relative to this entity by default, fixed buff if you enable fix buff

min_layer.name: min layer
min_layer.tooltip: lowest layer the summoned entity will be at. Set to -1 to use same layer as this entity

max_layer.name: max layer
max_layer.tooltip: highest layer the summoned entity will be at. Set to -1 to use same layer as this entity

type.anim_type.name: summon anim
tooltip: summon animation, 0 for no animation, 1 for warp animation,
2 for burrow animation, 3 for burrow animation and disable further burrow, 4 for entry animation.
The summoned entity must have burrow animation in order to use 2 or 3.

type.ignore_limit.name: ignore limit
type.ignore_limit.tooltip: ignore the stage entity limit. Be careful with this, don't summon too much. It can break the game

type.fix_buff.name: fix buff
tooltip: Use fixed buff instead of relative buff.
Ex: 200% summoner and 300% buff would mean 600% buff if fix buff is disabled and 300% buff if fix buff is enabled

type.same_health.name: same health
type.same_health.tooltip: Set the summoned entity to have the same health as this entity.

type.bond_hp.name: Bond health
type.bond_hp.tooltip: When activated, the summoner will receive all damage and procs the summoned entity receives

type.on_hit.name: on hit
tooltip: Summon if and only if this attack hits targets.
Summon per target attacked, distance origins are set to the targets' positions.
Multiple summon possible for ranged attack.

type.on_kill.name: on kill
tooltip: Summon if and only if this attack kills targets.
Summon per target killed, distance origins are set to the targets' positions.
Multiple summon possible for ranged attack.

type.pass_proc.name: Pass procs
type.pass_proc.tooltip: Passes all inflicted status to summoned units. 0 = none, 1 = from summoner, 2 = from attacked entities, 3 = from both

form.name: Form
form.tooltip: Set which form of the unit you want to summon. Only applicable on Cat Units.

format: (prob)% chance to have moving hit box,
originated at a distance of (dis) from this entity

width.name: width
width.tooltip: width of the hitbox, from left to right

dis.name: distance
dis.tooltip: describes the location of the center of the hitbox when initiated

IMUMOVING.format: [(mult==100){Immune}(mult<100&mult>0){Resistant}(mult<0){Weak}] to Moving Attacks[(mult<100&mult>0){ (_left)Decreases damage taken by (mult)%(_right)}(mult<0){ (_left)Increases damage taken by (_abs(mult))%(_right)}]

format: (prob)% chance to change the background to (_bg(id)) for (_dispTime(time))
[(type.kill){ and kills all entities on the field}]

type.kill.name: kill
type.kill.tooltip: Kill all entities in the stage

format: This effect is [(type.unstackable){not }]stackable[(type.ignoreMetal){, [(!type.modifAffected){and }]bypasses metal ability}][(type.modifAffected){, and it's damage is affected by anything that modifies the original attack's damage}].

damage.name: damage
damage.tooltip: whether it is percent or actual value depends on the damage type

type.damage_type.name: damage type
type.damage_type.tooltip: 0 for fixed damage (burn), 1 for a % of total health (poison), 2 for a % of current health, 3 for a % of lost health (corrode).

type.ignoreMetal.name: Bypass Metal
type.ignoreMetal.tooltip: Activate this to deal regular damage to metal enemies.

type.modifAffected.name: Consider Abilities
type.modifAffected.tooltip: Toggle this to make poison damage affected by damage-modifying abilities such as strong against or critical.

block.name: Blocker
block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce damage over time. Set to 100 to completely block poison

smartImu.name: Ignore
smartImu.tooltip: 0 = Resist all venom, 1 = Only resistant to harmful venom, -1 = Only resistant to healing venom

format: [(mult<100&mult>0){ (_left)Decreases damage taken by (mult)%(_right)}(mult<0){ (_left)Increases damage taken by (_abs(mult))%(_right)}]
[(block<100&block>0){ (_left)Decreases damage taken by (block)%(_right)}(block<0){ (_left)Increases damage taken by (_abs(block))%(_right)}]}]

block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce critical damage. Set to 100 to completely block crits

IMUATK.format: (prob)% chance to dodge attacks for (_dispTimeF(time))[(cd>0){, with a cooldown of (_dispTimeF(cd)) per dodge}]

cd.name: cooldown
cd.tooltip: Unit will not be able to dodge after the given amount of frames after proc ends

POIATK.format: (prob)% chance to inflict toxic (_left)Deals (mult)% of target's max health(_right)

VOLC.format: (prob)% chance to make a Lv (time/20) surge attack[(type.hitless){, even if this attack misses}] (_left)Lasts (_dispTime(time)), created within (dis_0) ~ (dis_1) range(_right)

type.hitless.name: Miss Trigger
type.hitless.tooltip: Wave will spawn even if this attack misses

format: [(mult<100&mult>0){ (_left)Decreases damage taken by (mult)%(_right)}(mult<0){ (_left)Increases damage taken by (_abs(mult))%(_right)}]
[(block<100&block>0){ (_left)Decreases damage taken by (block)%(_right)}(block<0){ (_left)Increases damage taken by (_abs(block))%(_right)}]}]

block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce damage. Set to 100 to completely block toxic

format: { (_left)Decreases damage taken by (mult)%(_right)}(mult<0){ (_left)Increases taken damage by (_abs(mult))%(_right)}]

block.name: Blocker
block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce damage. Set to 100 to completely block surges

ARMOR.format: (prob)% chance to [(mult<0){enchance}(mult>=0){break}] target's armor for (_dispTimeF(time)) (_left)Makes target take (_abs(mult))% [(mult<0){less}(mult>=0){more}] damage(_right)

type.name: type
type.tooltip: 0 for adding speed by a value, 1 for increasing the speed by a percentage, 2 for setting speed to a value

block.name: Blocker
block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce damage. Set to 100 to completely block armor break

smartImu.name: Ignore
smartImu.tooltip: 0 = Resist buffs and debuffs, 1 = Only resistant to armor debuffs, -1 = Only resistant to armor buffs

block.name: Blocker
block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce damage. Set to 100 to completely block Haste

smartImu.name: Ignore
smartImu.tooltip: 0 = Resist buffs and debuffs, 1 = Only resistant to speed debuffs, -1 = Only resistant to speed buffs

MINIWAVE.tooltip: Creates small wave which moves twice faster than normal wave with dynamic damage multiplication parameter
MINIWAVE.format: (prob)% chance to create a lv.(lv) [(inverted){inverted}] [(multi>100){mega}(multi<=100){mini}]-wave[(type.hitless){, even if this attack misses}] [(multi!=20){(_left)Gives target (multi)% of activator's damage(_right)}]

multi.name: multi
multi.tooltip:
Percentage of activator's damage.
If multi is 20, it will have 20% of activator's damage. Negative values are allowed

type.hitless.name: Miss Trigger
type.hitless.tooltip: Wave will spawn even if this attack misses

inverted.name: Inverted
inverted.tooltip: Start point, end point, and traversal direction are all inverted

DMGCUT.tooltip: This ability reduces all damage that is below certain amount to zero.
DMGCUT.format: (prob)% chance to [(reduction>=0){reduce}(reduction<0){increase}] [(type.traitIgnore){all }]damage lower than [(type.magnif){(_shield(dmg))}(!type.magnif){(dmg)}] by (reduction)% [(type.procs){ and ignore the attack's procs}]

dmg.name: damage
dmg.tooltip: The maximum amount of damage to be negated.

reduction.name: reduction %
reduction.tooltip: Percentage of the damage to reduce it by.

type.traitIgnore.name: ignore traits
type.traitIgnore.tooltip: When this is checked, this ability can trigger regardless of the attacker's trait.

type.procs.name: ignore procs
type.procs.tooltip: When this is checked, procs from nullified attacks will also be negated.

type.magnif.name: Use Magnification
type.magnif.tooltip: Activate this to make armor's HP affected by the entity's HP magnification.

DMGCAP.tooltip: This ability reduces all damage that is above certain amount to said amount (Or nullifies, if 'nullify damage' is checked).
DMGCAP.format: (prob)% chance to [(type.nullify){nullify[(type.traitIgnore){ all}]}(!type.nullify){set}] damage higher than [(type.magnif){(_shield(dmg))}(!type.magnif){(dmg)}][(!type.nullify){ to [(type.magnif){(_shield(dmg))}(!type.magnif){(dmg)}]}(type.procs){ and ignore the attack's procs}]

dmg.name: damage
dmg.tooltip: The minimum amount of damage to be capped.

type.traitIgnore.name: ignore traits
type.traitIgnore.tooltip: When this is checked, this ability can trigger regardless of the enemy's trait.

type.nullify.name: nullify damage
type.nullify.tooltip: When this is checked, damage from the attack will be negated instead of set to the amount

type.procs.name: ignore procs
type.procs.tooltip: When this is checked, procs from nullified attacks will also be negated.

type.magnif.name: Use Magnification
type.magnif.tooltip: Activate this to make shield's HP affected by the entity's HP magnification.

BARRIER.tooltip: Blocks all damage lower than the barrier's HP. Will break if an attack deals more damage than it's HP

regentime.name: Regeneration Time
regentime.tooltip: The entity's barrier will regenerate after a period of time passes. Set to 0 to deactivate this ability.

timeout.name: Timeout
timeout.tooltip: The entity's barrier will break after a period of time passes. Set to 0 to deactivate this ability.

type.magnif.name: Use Magnification
type.magnif.tooltip: Activate this to make barrier's HP affected by the entity's HP magnification.

DEMONSHIELD.tooltip: Blocks a certain amount of damage. Unlike barrier, it absorbs damage instead of negating it.
DEMONSHIELD.format: Aku Shield (_left)Shield has (_shield(hp)) HP, regenerates with (regen)% of its original HP when unit gets hitbacked(_right)

regen.name: regen
regen.tooltip: Percentage of the base HP it regenerates upon HB

SHIELDBREAK.tooltip: Directly breaks Aku shield. Be aware that this doesn't prevent shield from regenerating when hitbacked.

format: (prob)% chance to counterattack, dealing (damage)% [(!type.useOwnDamage){of the damage received from an attack [(maxDamage!=0){(_left)Up to (_abs(maxDamage))(_right)}]}
(type.useOwnDamage){of this unit's damage}] back. [(maxDamage<0){Counter damage will not exceed this unit's remaining HP. }]
[(type.counterWave!=0){This unit will also [(type.counterWave==1){counter}(type.counterWave==2){reflect}] wave/surge attacks. }][(type.procType!=0){This counterattack will
[(type.procType==1|type.procType==3){have}(type.procType==2){replace}] the original attack's procs[(type.procType==2){ with this unit's procs}(type.procType==3){ and this entity's procs}]. }]
The counter will hit [(type.areaAttack){ all enemies}(!type.areaAttack){ only the attacker}][(type.areaAttack|!type.outRange){[(!type.areaAttack){ if they're}] standing
[(minRange!=0|maxRange!=0){(minRange) ~ (maxRange) units away from this entity}(minRange==0&maxRange==0){on this entity's range}]}].

damage.name: Damage%
damage.tooltip: The percentage of damage to reflect when getting hit.

minRange.name: Blindspot
minRange.tooltip: The counter won't hit anything standing below this number. Leave this and Max Range in 0 to use the unit's normal range.

maxRange.name: Max Range
maxRange.tooltip: The counter will hit anything standing below this number. Leave this and Blindspot in 0 to use the unit's normal range.

type.procType.name: Proc Type
type.procType.tooltip: The parameter here affects how attack procs are handled. 0 = Removes all procs. 1 = Reflects all procs back to the attacker. 2 = Replaces all the attack's procs with this unit's procs. 3 = Uses both this entity and the attacker's procs. Useless if there's a hit registered as counter

type.counterWave.name: Counter Waves
type.counterWave.tooltip: Toggle response when hit with a Wave or Surge. 0 = Do Nothing. 1 = Counter. 2 = Reflect.

type.useOwnDamage.name: Use Own Damage
type.useOwnDamage.tooltip: Use this unit's damage for counters instead of received damage.

type.outRange.name: Ignore Distance
type.outRange.tooltip: Toggle this on and the unit will counter regardless of how far away the attacker is.

type.areaAttack.name: Area Attack
type.areaAttack.tooltip: Toggle this on and the counter will target all units in the counter's range. If left off, only the attacker will receive damage.

maxDamage.name: Damage Limit
maxDamage.tooltip: Counter won't deal more than the specified amount of damage. Set to 0 for no limit. Set to negative number to also cap it to unit's remaining HP

DEATHSURGE.format: (prob)% chance to make a surge attack for (_dispTime(time)) when killed (_left)Created within (dis_0) ~ (dis_1) range(_right)

type.name: type
type.tooltip: +1 for regular cannon immunity, +2 for slow beam immunity, +4 for thunderbolt immunity, +8 for waterblast immunity, +16 for holy blast immunity, +32 for breakerblast immunity, +64 for curseblast immunity

BOUNTY.format: [(mult>0){Pocket Sweep}(mult<0){Theft}] (_left)(_abs(mult))% [(mult>0){more}(mult<0){less}] money received upon defeating enemies(_right)

ATKBASE.format: [(mult>0){Base Destroyer}(mult<0){Bad at castle destruction}] (_left)Deals (_abs(mult))% [(mult>0){more}(mult<0){less}] damage to the Enemy Base(_right)

BSTHUNT.format: Behemoth Slayer (_left)Deals 2.5x damage[(prob>0){, }(prob==0){ and }]only takes 0.6x damage[(prob>0){, and (prob)% chance to dodge their attacks for (_dispTime(time))}](_right)

WORKERLV.tooltip: Increases worker level by a given amount
WORKERLV.format: (prob)% chance to [(mult>0){increase}(mult<0){decrease}] Worker Cat's level by (_abs(mult))

mult.name: Lv increase
mult.tooltip: The amount to add. Use negative numbers to decrease worker lv instead

CDSETTER.tooltip: Increases a certain unit's cooldown by a given amount
format: [(slot<0){a random unit}(slot>=0&slot<10){the unit in the lineup's (slot+1)[(slot==0){st}(slot==1){nd}(slot==2){rd}(slot>2){th}] slot}(slot==10){attacked unit}]'s cooldown

amount.name: increase
amount.tooltip: The amount to add. Use negative numbers to decrease cooldown instead

slot.name: slot
slot.tooltip: The slot of the unit to affect. Use -1 for random, and 10 to make the slot depend on the hit unit

type.name: type
type.tooltip: 0 = unit increase, 1 = percentage increase, 2 = set to value

WEAKAURA.tooltip: Decreases morale for all enemies in the given range

min_dis.name: Blindspot
min_dis.tooltip: Below this range, aura has no effect

max_dis.name: Max Reach
max_dis.tooltip: Above this range, aura has no effect

type.trait.name: Ignore Traits
type.trait.tooltip: Weakens all enemies regardless of typing if true

STRONGAURA.tooltip: Increases morale for all units in the given range

min_dis.name: Blindspot
min_dis.tooltip: Below this range, aura has no effect

max_dis.name: Max Reach
max_dis.tooltip: Above this range, aura has no effect

type.trait.name: Ignore Traits
type.trait.tooltip: Strenghtens all allies regardless of typing if true

skip_self.name: Self-Unaffected
skip_self.tooltip: If true, unit will not be affected by its own aura

REMOTESHIELD.tooltip: Lowers damage of attacks coming from a specified range
format: taken from hits originating (minrange) ~ (maxrange) units away from this entity by (_abs(reduction))%[(type.procs){ and
ignore the attack's procs}].[(block!=0){Additionally, [(block>0){lower}(block<0){increase}] damage taken from other units hit by
the attack by (_abs(block))%}]}(reduction==0&block!=0){(prob)% chance to [(block>0){block}(block<0){amplify}][(!type.traitCon){ all}]
damage taken from hits originating (minrange) ~ (maxrange) units away from this entity by (_abs(block))%[(type.procs){ and block the
attack's procs}].}][(type.waves){Wave/Surge attacks will be affected by this too.}]

minrange.name: Min. Range
minrange.tooltip: Attacks originating closer than this point will not be affected.

maxrange.name: Max. Range
maxrange.tooltip: Attacks originating further than this point will not be affected.

block.name: Block
block.tooltip: Like reduction, but applies to all units

type.traitCon.name: Focus Traits
type.traitCon.tooltip: Activate this to make this proc only work if the this unit targets a trait from the attacker

type.procs.name: Evade Procs
type.procs.tooltip: Attack's procs won't apply if shield triggers and this is activated

AI.tooltip: Allows the unit to keep away from enemy attacks and fight smarter
format: Strategist [(type.calcstrongest){ (_left)Unit will seek the most effective attack to use(_right)}]
[(retreatDist>0){ (_left)When in danger or enemies are (retreatDist) units away from this entity, unit will retreat at (retreatSpeed) speed(_right)}]
[(type.calcblindspot){ (_left)Unit will not count entities on it's blindspot for attack detection or other effectiveness calculations(_right)}]

type.calcstrongest.name: Check Strongest Attack
type.calcstrongest.tooltip: If this unit has more than one attack pattern, choose an attack based on which will deal the most effective damage instead of randomly

type.retreat.name: Retreat
type.retreat.tooltip: Move back if this unit is near an unit that is about to attack

type.calcblindspot.name: Blindspot Check
type.calcblindspot.tooltip: Unit will not attack if there's no enemies within the width of it's standing range and blindspot. If retreat is activated, this moves back an unit enters it's blindspot as well

retreatDist.name: Retreat Distance
retreatDist.tooltip: Minimum distance unit's retreat will activate

retreatSpeed.name: Retreat Speed
retreatSpeed.tooltip: Speed used to move back if retreat is activated

RAGE.tooltip: Enrages the target, making it's attacks hurt both enemies and it's own allies

HYPNO.tooltip: Turns the target against its own allies

block.name: Blocker
block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce duration amongst all units. Set to 100 to completely block Rage

block.name: Blocker
block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce duration amongst all units. Set to 100 to completely block Hypnosis

MINIVOLC.tooltip: Creates small surge that does exactly same behavior of normal surge, but with less damage
MINIVOLC.format: (prob)% chance to make a Lv(time/20) Mini Surge within (dis_0) ~ (dis_1) range[(type.hitless){, even if this attack misses}] for (_dispTime(time))[(mult!=20){ (_left)Deals (mult)% of attacker's damage(_right)}]

type.hitless.name: Miss Trigger
type.hitless.tooltip: Wave will spawn even if this attack misses

DEMONVOLC.tooltip: Creates a surge when hit by a surge with the hitting surge's level and duration
DEMONVOLC.format: (prob)% chance to make a surge when hit by a surge, with (mult)% of the surge's damage

DMGINC.tooltip: Increases damage dealt to enemies on the traits this unit targets. Pretty much Massive Damage, but adjustable

mult.name: multiplier
mult.tooltip: Actual value is affected by ITF fruits for some traits

DEFINC.tooltip: Decreases damage taken from enemies on the traits this unit targets. Pretty much Resistant, but adjustable

mult.name: multiplier
mult.tooltip: Actual value is affected by ITF fruits for some traits

RANGESHIELD.tooltip: Decreases damage taken from either single target or area attacks
RANGESHIELD.format: (prob)% chance to [(mult>0){decrease}(mult<0){increase}] damage taken from [(type.range){Area}(!type.range){Single Target}] Attacks by (_abs(mult))%

type.range.name: Area Attacks
type.range.tooltip: Activate this to make the shield affect Area Attacks instead of Single Target Attacks

SPIRIT.tooltip: Summons unit with invincibility and self-destruct automatically given, 150 range behind the summoner
format: Summon (_entity(id,form)) as spirit up to (amount) times[(amount>1){s}] per summoner, with a [(amount>1&cd0!=cd1){initial }]cooldown of (_dispTime(cd0))

cd0.name: Initial CD
cd0.tooltip: Minimum and default is 15. Cooldown for the first spirit spawn

cd1.name: Respawn CD
cd1.tooltip: Minimum and default is 15. Cooldown for the first spirit spawn

summonerCd.name: CD Penalty
summonerCd.tooltip: Amount of Recharge time to be added (or removed if negative) to the main unit if a spirit is spawned

moneyCost.name: Cost Penalty
moneyCost.tooltip: Makes the spirit cost money to summon

animType.name: Animation Type
tooltip: summon animation, 0 for no animation, 1 for warp animation,
2 for burrow animation, 3 for burrow animation and disable further burrow, 4 for entry animation.
The summoned entity must have burrow animation in order to use 2 or 3.

type.inv.name: Invincible
type.inv.tooltip: Makes unit spirits unkillable, much like the soul ones

METALKILL.tooltip: Decreases metal target's current HP with specified percentage value along with the normal attack too
METALKILL.format: Metal Killer (_left)Decreases (mult)% of target's current HP(_right)

BLAST.tooltip: Creates blast attack that spreads to each side with weaker damage over each blasts
BLAST.format: (prob)% chance to create a Lv.(lv) blast attack[(lv>1){, with (reduction)% damage reduction per wave}] (_left)Created [(dis_0==dis_1){at (dis_0) range}(dis_0!=dis_1){within (dis_0) ~ (dis_1) range}](_right)

lv.name: Level
lv.tooltip: BC Default is 3. The higher, the further it reaches

reduction.name: Reduction
reduction.tooltip: BC Default is 30. Determines the amount of damage in % the explosions' damage will be reduced per level

mult.name: percent
mult.tooltip: Set negative to make this unit weak to the effect

block.name: Blocker
block.tooltip: Set from 1 to 99 to reduce duration amongst all units. Set to 100 to completely block slow. Set negative to increase the effect.
